title: Amazon API Gateway to Amazon Comprehend
description: Create a REST API that acts as a proxy to Amazon Comprehend DetectSentiment API operation.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use Amazon API Gateway REST API as a proxy to Amazon Comprehend DetectSentiment API.
You can easily utilise this solution to expose other Comprehend API operations as well with minimal efforts
